title: Temple Altar
description: You are at the altar of the Temple of Midgaard. A large marble altar is here, covered in candles and incense. A priest watches silently as you approach.

south.description: A hallway leads south, back into the main temple chamber.

north.description: A narrow passage leads north into the priest's chambers.

extra_descriptions.description: The marble altar is covered in candles, incense, and sacred symbols.
